name: Erik van Kempen on GitHub
body:
### Erik van Kempen

I am a lecturer in Statistics, ERP and Business Intelligence at Fontys Univerity of Applied Sciences in Eindhoven, The Netherlands. Prior to my lectureship, I obtained a Bachelor of Business Administration in
Accountancy. My research interests are in the areas continuous assurance, smart auditing, business intelligence and process mining.

Currently I am working on a custom package in R: continuityequations.

### Continuity Equations
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
